window_get_fullscreen: This function returns whether the game window is in fullscreen mode (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>).

{ANY_CODE} if window_get_fullscreen()
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}draw_text(32, 32, "Fullscreen is ON");
{nbsp_x4}}
else {nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}draw_text(32, 32, "Fullscreen is OFF");
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code will check to see if the window is in full screen mode or not and draw a text message depending on the returned value.
